prompts: Create a snowy creature with thick fur and large tusks, perfect for icy environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a woolly mammoth, featuring a brown body and white tusks.
Generate a character that can thrive in cold climates, with a bulky frame and a gentle demeanor.
Design a Pokemon with a fluffy exterior and strong physical attacks, suitable for battling.
Show me a creature that embodies the spirit of winter, with a round shape and prominent teeth.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric animal, showcasing a rugged appearance and tough skin.
Make a design for a Pokemon that loves to dig in the snow, with a unique ice type ability.
